modShortDescription: Blocks more default open slots (from 27 to 12). Adding Triple Pocket Mod to all armor and making out Pack Mule perk unblocks all slots.
modDescription:
Blocks more default open slots (from 27 to 12). Adding Triple Pocket Mod to all armor and making out Pack Mule perk unblocks all slots.

Additional credits: “Reverse Inspiration” and XML borrowing from Khaine’s [60-slot Bigger Backpack Mod](https://7daystodiemods.com/bigger-backpack-mod-60-96-slot-with-without-food-water-bar-on-hud/).

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/doughphunghus/7D2D-Doughs-Mods-a19/tree/main/Doughs-Nerf-Backpack-CarryCapacity)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17197-doughs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Doughphunghus](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/doughphunghus/)
